source:
TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_SEQ_00Ardashir is concerned about the anima's growth.
※Changing classes or jobs will prevent progress during this quest.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_SEQ_00Règle spéciale:  classe ou job fixe
Ardashir pense que l'esprit a besoin d'une nouvelle pierre d'âme pour s'épanouir.

source:
TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_SEQ_01The anima has grown at a rattling pace, absorbing large amounts of aether in the process. Ardashir fears this rapid development may exceed the limits of the soulstone serving as its base. To ensure all your hard work is not wasted, he plans to fortify the soulstone, as well as have Gerolt forge a new weapon to hold it. This new weapon, however, will require four materials essential for conducting large quantities of aether: enchanted rubber, fast-drying carboncoat, fast-acting Allagan catalyst, and divine water. Gerolt suggests seeking out a merchant named Cristiana at the House of Splendors in Mor Dhona who may have what he requires.

※You may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_SEQ_01* Cette quête fait l'objet de la règle spéciale  classe ou job fixe. Il n'est possible de progresser qu'avec la classe ou le job qui a servi à la commencer.
* Il est nécessaire de s'équiper ou d'avoir dans son inventaire ou arsenal l'arme anima pour progresser.

Afin de permettre à l'esprit synthétique de poursuivre son développement, Ardashir a décidé d'améliorer la pierre d'âme qui l'accueille. Gerolt, lui, va devoir forger une nouvelle arme anima sur laquelle la pierre pourra être fixée. Ayant pour cela besoin de matériaux à forte conductivité éthéréenne, il vous a demandé de lui apporter , , , et . Pour obtenir ces objets, adressez-vous à Cristiana, au Glas des revenants, dans le Mor Dhona.

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_SEQ_02<tab>Cristiana's wares are limited, but she does, in fact, have what you seek. If only it were as simple as paying her in gil. She demands several expertly exotic goods in exchange for the materials Gerolt asked for. Whether you fashion them, find them, or trade for them, you must acquire what Gerolt needs if you are to complete the anima weapon.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_SEQ_02<tab>Ses affaires n'étant pas assez florissantes à son goût, Cristiana vous a demandé de lui apporter des produits sus<var 16 /var>cep<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>bles d'intéresser ses clients, en échange des matériaux demandés par Gerolt. Satisfaites à ses demandes pour obtenir <var 33 ((Item)) 02F235090202 /var>, <var 33 ((Item)) 02F2350A0202 /var>, <var 33 ((Item)) 02F2350C0202 /var>, et <var 33 ((Item)) 02F2350B0202 /var>, puis retournez à l'Hélice, à Azys Lla, pour livrer sa commande au forgeron.

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_SEQ_03<tab>You acquire the materials necessary to affix the anima's soulstone to a new weapon. Gerolt takes up his hammer and once again puts his legendary skills to work. The familiar ring of his hammer fills the air, but the medley soon comes to a halt. His latest masterpiece is complete, and your weapon is born anew! You hold it aloft, basking in its light, when what appears to be a sprite takes shape before you and thanks you for all you have done. You smile and nod, knowing your journey together has only just begun.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_SEQ_03<tab>Vous avez remis à Gerolt les matériaux conducteurs d'éther qu'il vous avait demandés, et il a pu forger une arme anima de nouvelle génération, qui permettra à l'esprit qui l'habite de s'épanouir pleinement. Ardashir est bien décidé à poursuivre ses recherches sur les esprits synthétiques et, grâce à votre aide et à celle du meilleur forgeron d'Éorzéa, à faire entrer les armes anima dans la légende. Entraînez-vous à tirer le meilleur parti de la vôtre au cours de vos aventures, car elle recèle encore de nombreux secrets<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_SYSTEM_100_000<tab>Please note that upon completing the quest “Coming into Its Own,” you will receive an anima weapon for <var 08 E4E9450B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9450F ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94506 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9451B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94522 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((a <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_SYSTEM_100_000<tab>Si vous commencez la quête “Anima nova” maintenant, l'arme anima que vous pourrez améliorer est celle <var 08 E4E90501 ((<var 08 E4E94506 ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94507 ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94508 ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9450B ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9450C ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9450F ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9451B ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9451C ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9451D ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94522 ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((de <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94506 ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94503 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94507 ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94503 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94508 ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94503 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9450B ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94503 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9450C ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94503 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9450F ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94503 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9451B ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94503 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9451C ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94503 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9451D ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94503 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94522 ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94503 /var>)) ((de <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94503 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you do?
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_Q1_000_000<tab>Améliorer l'arme anima <var 08 E4E90501 ((<var 08 E4E94506 ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94507 ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94508 ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9450B ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9450C ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9450F ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9451B ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9451C ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9451D ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94522 ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((de <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94506 ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94503 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94507 ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94503 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94508 ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94503 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9450B ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94503 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9450C ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94503 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9450F ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94503 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9451B ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94503 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9451C ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94503 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9451D ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94503 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94522 ((d'<var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94503 /var>)) ((de <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94503 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var><var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_A1_000_000<tab>Undertake this quest as another job.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_A1_000_000<tab>Non

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_A2_000_000<tab>Undertake this quest as <var 08 E4E9450B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9450F ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94506 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E9451B ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E94522 ((an <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) ((a <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_A2_000_000<tab>Oui

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_SYSTEM_100_001<tab>Be advised that once you have undertaken this quest, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted it.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_SYSTEM_100_001<tab>Une fois la quête “Anima Nova” commencée, vous ne pourrez améliorer l'arme anima d'une autre classe ou d'un autre job qu'en la terminant ou l'abandonnant.

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_SYSTEM_100_002<tab>Please ensure you have changed to your desired job before speaking with Ardashir.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_SYSTEM_100_002<tab>Sélectionnez la classe ou le job de votre choix puis reparlez à Ardashir.

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_SYSTEM_100_003<tab>In order to receive the quest “Coming into Its Own,” you must be equipped with <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var> and <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8030202 /var>.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_SYSTEM_100_003<tab>Vous devez être équipé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> ou en possession <var 33 ((Item)) 0AE8020202 /var> et <var 33 ((Item)) 0AE8030202 /var> pour commencer la quête “Anima nova”.

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_SYSTEM_100_004<tab>In order to receive the quest “Coming into Its Own,” you must be equipped with <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var>.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_SYSTEM_100_004<tab>Vous devez être équipé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> ou en possession <var 33 ((Item)) 0AE8020202 /var> pour commencer la quête “Anima nova”.

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_SYSTEM_100_005<tab>You have already received <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var> and <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8030202 /var>. Please change to a different job and speak with Ardashir again.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_SYSTEM_100_005<tab>Vous possédez déjà <var 33 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var> et <var 33 ((Item)) 03E8030202 /var>. Sélectionnez une autre classe ou un autre job et reparlez à Ardashir.

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_SYSTEM_100_006<tab>You have already received <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var>. Please change to a different job and speak with Ardashir again.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_SYSTEM_100_006<tab>Vous possédez déjà <var 33 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var>. Sélectionnez une autre classe ou un autre job et reparlez à Ardashir.

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_000_000<tab>The anima's growth thus far is well beyond what I expected. By absorbing aether during our travels, it has matured enough to take on a form separate from the weapon, and even speak to <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_000_000<tab><var 08 E905 ((Madame)) ((Monsieur)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, grâce à vos efforts, l'esprit synthétique a progressé de façon spectaculaire<var 1D /var>! Je dois avouer que je suis même surpris qu'il se soit adressé à vous directement.

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_000_001<tab>To grow so quickly would have required a substantial amount of aether. However, the soulstone is not without its limits. As it continues to absorb aether and grow, I fear it may not bear the strain of further development.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_000_001<tab>Mais nous devons rester attentifs, car s'il continue à grandir à un tel rythme, je doute que la pierre d'âme qui l'accueille lui suffise longtemps...

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_002<tab>Yer tellin' me after all the work <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> did, the anima could swell up like a Bombard an' burst!? Ye better have a plan to fix it, 'cause I sure as hells ain't startin' over.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_002<tab>Tu veux dire qu'la bestiole sera bientôt trop grosse et qu'le caillou pourrait s'briser<var 1D /var>? Hé gamin, j'espère que t'as un plan, parce que Rowena va pas aimer ça<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_000_003<tab>Who exactly do you think you are talking to? This is <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> life's work, short a time as that may be. Of course I have a plan.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_000_003<tab>Évidemment, voyons<var 1D /var>! Pour qui me prenez-vous<var 1D /var>? J'avais déjà imaginé cette possibilité, même si c'est la première fois que je dois y faire face au cours de mes recherches.

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_000_004<tab>If we can reinforce the soulstone and increase its capacity for aetheric energies, it should remain stable. I will speak with Rowena and see to collecting what we require.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_000_004<tab>D'après moi, la meilleure solution serait de renforcer la pierre d'âme et d'en augmenter la capacité. J'ai ma petite idée sur le procédé à suivre, mais il va nous falloir obtenir quelques matériaux de la part de ma<var 16 /var>de<var 16 /var>moi<var 16 /var>sel<var 16 /var>le Rowena.

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_005<tab>Ah, ye had me fooled when you was beggin' and pleadin' to see those Sharlayan books before. Good to know yer incompetence was only fer show. Well, seein' as ye have everythin' under control, if ye don't mind I think I'll─
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_005<tab>Bah tu vois, quand tu veux<var 1D /var>! Ça m'rassure de savoir que t'as la situation en main. Du coup, vous m'excuserez, mais j'vais en profiter pour me siffler une p'tite...

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_000_006<tab>Run off to some tavern to get deep in your cups? Sadly you haven't the time nor the coin for it. Not when you have a new weapon to make for our friend <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> here.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_000_006<tab>Une minute, Monsieur Gerolt<var 1D /var>! Ce n'est pas le moment d'aller à la taverne, voyons. Nous allons aussi avoir besoin de vos talents de forgeron.

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_007<tab>A new weapon!? I just finished fixin' the one <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> has now. Why the hells do ye need another?
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_007<tab>Quoi<var 1D /var>!? Mais j'viens tout juste de renforcer l'arme anima de <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_000_008<tab>Just as we develop and change over time, it is only fitting the anima should as well. Or do you mean to tell me you were always such a gentleman, even as a child?
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_000_008<tab>Vous vous doutez bien que si la précédente pierre d'âme n'est plus adaptée, cette arme ne le sera pas non plus... J'ai bien peur qu'il vous faille en forger une nouvelle.

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_009<tab><sigh> It never ends, does it? Fine, if it'll help settle me debt with Rowena, ye'll have yer bleedin' weapon.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_009<tab>Grrr, quand est-ce qu'on m'laissera enfin tranquille<var 1D /var>? Bon, c'est bien parce que ma dette envers Rowena est en jeu... Tu l'auras, ta nouvelle arme, gamin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_010<tab>If we're attachin' the soulstone to a new weapon, we're gonna need materials fer conductin' aether. That's where you come in.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_010<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, y a pas d'raison qu'tu restes ici à te tourner les pouces. Pour fixer la nouvelle pierre d'âme, j'vais avoir besoin d'matériaux conducteurs d'éther, mais mes réserves sont dé<var 16 /var>ses<var 16 /var>pé<var 16 /var>ré<var 16 /var>ment vides.

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_011<tab>I need ye to go and fetch me some enchanted rubber, fast-drying carboncoat, fast-acting Allagan catalyst, and divine water.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_011<tab>Ouvre grand tes esgourdes. J'veux qu'tu m'apportes <var 33 ((Item)) 02F235090202 /var>, <var 33 ((Item)) 02F2350A0202 /var> et <var 33 ((Item)) 02F2350C0202 /var>. Ah, <var 33 ((Item)) 02F2350B0202 /var>, aussi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_012<tab>I know a lass in Mor Dhona what sells 'em─Cristiana's her name. Like as not, ye'll find her keepin' a corner somewhere at the House o' Splendors. They won't come cheap, but yer a resourceful sort. I'm sure ye'll think o' somethin'.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_012<tab>Pas la peine d'embêter Rowena avec ça, ses assistantes devraient en avoir en stock. Va donc voir Cristiana, c'est une brave petite, celle-là.

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_000_020<tab>This anima has grown remarkably fast. Judging by the rise in its aetheric levels, we'll soon need to reinforce the soulstone for this one as well.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_000_020<tab>Grâce à vos efforts, nous avons bien avancé. Il va maintenant nous falloir améliorer la pierre d'âme, car elle ne pourra bientôt plus contenir la croissance de l'esprit.

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_021<tab>Meanin' I have to fire up the forge again, eh? Well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, that means there's work for you as well.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_021<tab>Ouais, et moi j'vais forger une nouvelle arme pour l'y fixer. Mais t'en fais pas, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, tu vas avoir ta part de boulot, toi aussi.

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_022<tab>We're gonna need another round of enchanted rubber, fast-drying carboncoat, fast-acting Allagan catalyst, and divine water.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_022<tab>Tu vas aller m'chercher <var 33 ((Item)) 02F235090202 /var>, <var 33 ((Item)) 02F2350A0202 /var>, <var 33 ((Item)) 02F2350C0202 /var>, et pour finir, <var 33 ((Item)) 02F2350B0202 /var>.

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_023<tab>Go and speak with Cristiana at the House o' Splendors. She should be able to get you what we need.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_023<tab>Adresse-toi à Cristiana, une des assistantes de Rowena. Te connaissant, t'auras aucun problème à la convaincre de t'fournir tout ça.

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_CRISTIANA_100_030<tab>A customer? A customer! You are a customer, aren't you? I mean, I realize this isn't a proper stall, but I do have wares to sell. That is, if, um, you're willing to buy them. Have you come to buy my wares?
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_CRISTIANA_100_030<tab><var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((Bonsoir)) ((Bonjour)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Bonjour)) ((Bonsoir)) /var>)) /var> <var 08 E905 ((ma mignonne)) ((mon mignon)) /var>, qu'est-ce qui vous amène dans mon coin<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_CRISTIANA_100_031<tab>Aether-conductive materials? I think I have what you're looking for, but it won't come cheap!
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_CRISTIANA_100_031<tab>Des matériaux à forte conductivité éthéréenne, hein<var 1D /var>? Bien sûr que j'ai ça en magasin<var 1D /var>! Mais comme vous vous en doutez, tout a un prix...

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_CRISTIANA_100_032<tab>Truth be told, I don't get buyers for these items all that often, but now that I have you─my new favorite customer─I'm sure to turn a profit, and then I can build a stall of my very own!
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_CRISTIANA_100_032<tab>À la maison des splendeurs, mes produits ne sont malheureusement pas les plus populaires. Vous comprendrez que je ne peux pas laisser passer une occasion pareille de remplir mes caisses<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_CRISTIANA_100_033<tab>But I don't want your gil! No, dealing with gil is much too messy. What with all the counting, and sorting, and finding a place to─ Ahem. Bartering is much simpler, don't you think? There are a few things I'd be willing to trade for, if you're interested.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_CRISTIANA_100_033<tab>Je vous propose un marché. Apportez-moi des objets de valeur dont je pourrai tirer un bon prix et je vous donnerai ce qui vous intéresse.

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_CRISTIANA_100_034<tab>A customer? A customer! Oh, and a returning one at that! You did come to buy something, didn't you? I mean, I realize this isn't a proper stall, but I still have wares to sell. That is, if, um, you're willing to buy them. Have you come to buy my wares?
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_CRISTIANA_100_034<tab>Si seulement je pouvais quitter ce coin mal éclairé, peut-être que j'aurais plus de clients... Ah, c'est vous<var 1D /var>! Désolée, je ne vous avais pas vu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> arriver.

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_CRISTIANA_100_035<tab>Is that not what you asked for last time? I mean, I <var 1A 02 /var>think<var 1A 01 /var> that's what you asked for. I recall something about rubber and water, and─ Ahem, excuse me. If that's what you're looking for, then you know what I'll need in exchange.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_CRISTIANA_100_035<tab>Vous avez encore besoin de matériaux à forte conductivité éthéréenne<var 1D /var>? Dans ce cas, je vous propose le même échange que la dernière fois. Apportez-moi des objets dont je pourrai tirer un bon prix et je vous donnerai ce que vous voulez.

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_SYSTEM_100_034<tab>The goods requested by Cristiana can be obtained through various means including dungeons, beast tribe quests, and crafting.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_SYSTEM_100_034<tab>Les objets désirés par Cristiana peuvent être trouvés à divers endroits en Éorzéa, ou en faisant appel aux services d'artisans.

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_SYSTEM_100_035<tab>Speak with other players and share information to discover how to find them!
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_SYSTEM_100_035<tab>N'hésitez pas à échanger des in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions avec les autres joueurs pour vous les procurer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_030<tab>Get everythin' we need? Good. Hand it all over─the weapon, too.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_030<tab>Alors<var 1D /var>? T'as réussi à mettre la main sur c'que j't'ai demandé<var 1D /var>? Fais-moi vite voir ça, avec ton arme anima éveillée, bien sûr<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_031<tab>Ardashir's ready to work on the soulstone, and he won't shut up about it. At least now it'll all be over.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_031<tab>Le gamin a fini d'améliorer son caillou, et y m'casse les pieds depuis tout à l'heure pour savoir quand j'vais me mettre au boulot... J'vais finir ça en deux temps, trois mouvements<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_032<tab>Oi, I thought ye said ye had everything we need!
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_032<tab>Tu m'prends pour une buse<var 1D /var>? Reviens quand t'auras récupéré tous les matériaux, sinon j'peux pas m'mettre au boulot<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_100_032<tab>That's enchanted rubber, fast-drying carboncoat, fast-acting Allagan catalyst, and divine water. If yer missing somethin', hurry on back to Cristiana.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_100_032<tab>Il me faut <var 33 ((Item)) 02F235090202 /var>, <var 33 ((Item)) 02F2350A0202 /var>, <var 33 ((Item)) 02F2350C0202 /var>, et <var 33 ((Item)) 02F2350B0202 /var>. Et qu'ça saute<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_033<tab>Good on ye, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. Now then, let's make us a weapon, eh?
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_033<tab>Parfait, tout y est<var 1D /var>! Ouvrez grands vos yeux les jeunes, vous allez voir c'que c'est qu'un vrai forgeron<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_040<tab><pant> <pant> Can't say I've ever forged somethin' quite so extraordinary. A weapon fit for yer growin' anima. Nay, something more than that.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_040<tab>Haa... Haa... J'y ai vraiment mis toutes mes forces... Ça y est, elle est enfin achevée, l'arme anima de seconde génération capable de contenir la croissance de l'esprit qui l'habite...

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_041<tab>A beauty worthy o' ballads─Almace, a sword without equal. Together with Ancile, the gods themselves'd be hard-pressed to lay a blow on ye.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_041<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, voici ta nouvelle arme et ton nouveau bouclier anima, <var 33 ((Item)) 03F233A70202 /var> et <var 33 ((Item)) 03F233B40202 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_042<tab>A beauty worthy o' ballads─Verethragna. The gods themselves'd be jealous o' knuckles so fine.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_042<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, voici ta nouvelle arme anima, <var 33 ((Item)) 03F233A80202 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_100_043<tab>A beauty worthy o' ballads─Ukonvasara. The gods themselves'd be jealous of an axe so fine.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_100_043<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, voici ta nouvelle arme anima, <var 33 ((Item)) 03F233A90202 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_100_044<tab>A beauty worthy o' ballads─Rhongomiant. The gods themselves'd be jealous of a lance so fine.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_100_044<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, voici ta nouvelle arme anima, <var 33 ((Item)) 03F233AA0202 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_100_045<tab>A beauty worthy o' ballads─Gandiva. The gods themselves'd be jealous of a bow so fine.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_100_045<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, voici ta nouvelle arme anima, <var 33 ((Item)) 03F233AB0202 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_100_046<tab>A beauty worthy o' ballads─Majestas. The gods themselves'd be jealous of a staff so fine.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_100_046<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, voici ta nouvelle arme anima, <var 33 ((Item)) 03F233AF0202 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_100_047<tab>A beauty worthy o' ballads─Hvergelmir. The gods themselves'd be jealous of a staff so fine.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_100_047<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, voici ta nouvelle arme anima, <var 33 ((Item)) 03F233B00202 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_100_048<tab>A beauty worthy o' ballads─Draconomicon. The gods themselves'd be jealous of a tome so fine.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_100_048<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, voici ta nouvelle arme anima, <var 33 ((Item)) 03F233B10202 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_100_049<tab>A beauty worthy o' ballads─Tetrabiblos. The gods themselves'd be jealous of a tome so fine.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_100_049<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, voici ta nouvelle arme anima, <var 33 ((Item)) 03F233B20202 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_100_050<tab>A beauty worthy o' ballads─Kannagi. The gods themselves'd be jealous of a pair o' blades so fine.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_100_050<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, voici ta nouvelle arme anima, <var 33 ((Item)) 03F233AC0202 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_100_051<tab>A beauty worthy o' ballads─Nothung. The gods themselves'd be jealous of a blade so fine.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_100_051<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, voici ta nouvelle arme anima, <var 33 ((Item)) 03F233AD0202 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_100_052<tab>A beauty worthy o' ballads─Armageddon. The gods themselves'd be jealous of a firearm so fine.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_100_052<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, voici ta nouvelle arme anima, <var 33 ((Item)) 03F233AE0202 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_100_053<tab>A beauty worthy o' ballads─Deneb. The gods themselves'd be jealous of an astrolabe so fine.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_100_053<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, voici ta nouvelle arme anima, <var 33 ((Item)) 03F233B30202 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_BUKINOSEIREI_000_035<tab>(-???-)Thank...you...
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_BUKINOSEIREI_000_035<tab>(-???-)... Ga... Pi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_050<tab>Wait till Rowena takes a gander at this. We keep this up an' she'll be givin' <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> notes o' promise.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_050<tab>En toute modestie, j'dois dire que j'suis très satisfait d'mon travail. C'est pas demain la veille qu'y aura un meilleur forgeron qu'moi en Éorzéa, foi d'Gerolt<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_000_051<tab>To be honest, I once questioned what use I had for a drunkard with a hammer. But you have proven yourself to be quite the competent blacksmith─when you're sober.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_000_051<tab>Je dois avouer que je vous avais mal jugé. Je persiste à dire que votre penchant pour la boisson vous dessert, mais votre réputation est on ne peut plus méritée.

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_000_052<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I am at a loss as to how to express my thanks. You looked danger in the eye, unflinching, risking life and limb to help me. I hope someday I can repay your kindness.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_000_052<tab>Quant à vous, <var 08 E905 ((Madame)) ((Monsieur)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... Rien de tout cela n'aurait été possible sans votre aide. Je vous suis vraiment re<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>sant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_053<tab>(Tch. Sure <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> carried it around a bit, but I <var 1A 02 /var>made<var 1A 01 /var> the damned thing! Don't I deserve a little more than left-handed compliments?)
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_053<tab>(Non mais pour qui il s'prend, ce mioche<var 1D /var>?)

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_100_054<tab>What!? The anima manifested again? When?
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_100_054<tab>Comment<var 1D /var>!? Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>? L'esprit est sorti de l'arme anima sous vos yeux, et il s'est même approché tout près de nous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_100_055<tab>But I didn't see anything. Are you certain?
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_100_055<tab>C'est étrange, je n'ai absolument rien remarqué... Et vous, Monsieur Gerolt, l'avez-vous aperçu<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_100_057<tab>Why is it that only you are able to see the anima when it chooses to present itself?
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_100_057<tab>Ça alors, c'est surprenant... Seul<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> <var 08 E905 ((madame)) ((monsieur)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> peut voir l'esprit. Il y a forcément une raison, mais laquelle<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_100_059<tab>Maybe it's got no interest in the likes o' you.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_100_059<tab>C'est plus fort que toi, faut toujours que t'expliques tout, hein<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_100_058<tab>I suppose the anima is not yet strong enough. Perhaps one day, after it has fully matured, we too will be able to behold its wonders.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_100_058<tab>J'aurais tant aimé voir de mes propres yeux l'esprit synthétique que j'ai créé... Mais ce n'est que partie remise. Je vais poursuivre mes recherches, et un jour, je découvrirai comment reproduire ce phénomène<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_000_054<tab>This calls to mind Thavnairian literature on the Zodiac Braves, legendary heroes who wielded arms of unparalleled strength.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_000_054<tab>... On raconte que des héros des temps anciens se battaient avec des armes légendaires appelées “armes du zodiaque”.

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_000_055<tab>But soon they will tell tales of a new legend─of you and your anima weapon!
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_000_055<tab>Qui sait, peut-être que cette arme anima que nous avons créée ensemble entrera un jour dans la légende elle aussi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_056<tab>Now don't be gettin' ahead o' yerself, lad. There's no denying it's a beauty, but there's still room for improvement.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_000_056<tab>Minute, gamin, tu vas un peu trop vite en besogne. Qu'est-ce qui t'dit qu'on pourrait pas y apporter encore quelques améliorations<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_100_056<tab>Ye just said yerself the anima ain't fully matured yet.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROLT_100_056<tab>Et puis, la bestiole qui l'habite va continuer à grandir, et on risque d'avoir quelques surprises.

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_000_057<tab>I do not need <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> to remind me of such things.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_000_057<tab>Vous avez raison, cette ex<var 16 /var>pé<var 16 /var>ri<var 16 /var>men<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>tion ne fait que commencer<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_000_058<tab>I have kept a rather comprehensive account of everything we have done thus far. With all the data I have collected, it is only a matter of time before the next step in fostering the anima is clear.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_000_058<tab>J'ai beaucoup de travail qui m'attend pour la suite de mes recherches, et j'espère bien pouvoir compter sur votre aide lorsque j'en aurai besoin.

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_000_059<tab>Which reminds me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. If you would care to read over my notes on our work, you are more than welcome to pore over them at your leisure. They are on the table just over there.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_000_059<tab>Au fait, <var 08 E905 ((Madame)) ((Monsieur)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, j'ai pris le soin de compiler toutes les notes que j'ai prises depuis le début de notre col<var 16 /var>la<var 16 /var>bo<var 16 /var>ra<var 16 /var>tion. N'hésitez pas à y jeter un œil si cela vous intéresse.

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROL_000_060<tab>(Aye, that's the way, lad. Every step that brings us closer to finishin' this bleedin' weapon brings me a step closer to a life free from debt and that gil-swindlin' wench Rowena.)
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_GEROL_000_060<tab>(Hé hé, tout se passe pour le mieux. Le gamin va continuer à se creuser la tête pour parfaire les armes anima, et je pourrai bientôt donner à Rowena ce qu'elle attend... Adieu ma dette, et à moi la belle vie à la taverne<var 1D /var>!)

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_000_070<tab>Again we have succeeded in creating an anima weapon! Excellent work.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_000_070<tab><var 08 E905 ((Madame)) ((Monsieur)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, nous avons réussi à créer une nouvelle arme anima<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_100_071<tab>You say the anima has manifested itself yet again? That is good to hear.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_100_071<tab>Oh, l'esprit s'est à nouveau manifesté près de nous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_100_072<tab>Much like the last, I look forward to the day I can behold its wonder with my own eyes.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_100_072<tab>Cette fois encore, je n'ai rien remarqué. Mais je ne perds pas espoir de comprendre un jour ce qui se cache derrière ce phénomène.

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_000_071<tab>All the more reason I must continue my research! Our work is without precedent, 'tis true, but I will not be deterred.
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_000_071<tab>Je vais continuer à travailler dur sur mes recherches, et j'espère bien pouvoir compter sur votre aide lorsque j'en aurai besoin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_SYSTEM_000_072<tab>Your weapon has been forged anew, and the anima's strength blossoms!
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_SYSTEM_000_072<tab>Vous êtes désormais en possession d'une nouvelle arme anima, plus résistante et puissante que jamais<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_100_056<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBREL103_02214_ARDASHIR_100_056<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
